name: Yelafath
desc: The owner of the Atlahua's Net from the People of the Springs.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
It's said that Yelafath, the owner of "Atlahua's Net," dislikes the heat and is active mostly at night. Even when visiting her beloved Koholasaurs, she only sets out on cool evenings. Perhaps because of this, her Genius Invokation TCG deck exudes a distinct chill.
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Mualani
customize.desc:
"Splish-Splash Wavechaser" Mualani

Swellrider of Perennial Springs

customize.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
customize.desc:
"Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi

To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship.

customize.name: Layla
customize.desc:
"Fantastical Evening Star" Layla

As night falls, the stars swirl and the moon wanders amidst dreams.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
